about_the_game:
Your only goal in Harbor is to survive. In the breathtaking atmosphere of post-apocalyptic anarchy, you must gain access to limited resources and protect everything you have.

You will face more than just hunger and thirst! You can form alliances, build shelters, and trade with others. In this open world, everything is out to get you. No democracy, no rules—there’s only one safe zone: HARBOR.
